title: Taco Pasta Salad with French Dressing

Ingredients.3: 1 (16 ounce) package uncooked tri-color rotini pasta

Ingredients.5: 1 (14 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed

Ingredients.6: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese

Ingredients.10: 1 (8 ounce) package nacho cheese-flavored corn chips (such as Doritos®), crushed

Directions.1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add beef and taco seasoning; saute until beef is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes. Let cool.

Directions.2: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook rotini at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes. Drain and let cool, about 10 minutes.

Directions.3: Combine cooled beef and rotini with French dressing, black beans, and Cheddar cheese. Mix well and chill until ready to serve.

Directions.4: Fold in lettuce, tomato, and green onions. Sprinkle crushed chips on top or serve on the side.
